name: Cambridge Lodge Budget Hostel
description:
Welcome to Cambridge Lodge - Your home away from home!

We are just a short 10 minute walk away from the funkiest part of Sydney, Newtown. With the uni, trendy cafes, pubs, bars, live music and all walks of life, this area is a breath of fresh air compared to the big bustling city streets and it's only 8 minutes away on the train from Central station.

We offer shared dorm rooms or private rooms at competitive prices and pride yourself on cleanliness and friendliness! 
*Free public parking on the street

- Office Hours: Mon - Sun 9.30am - 6.30pm **If you are set to arrive after 6:30pm you must let us know so arrangements can be made for you. Late arrival bookings must be prepaid.**
- Reception on Merchant St
- Age Restriction for 6 bed dorm and 4 bed dorm rooms (18 -40 y.o.)
- During winter reception will be open from 8:30am - 6.30pm. **Please be aware of this when booking and advise if you are going to be checking in after 6:30pm. After hours check in is available by request only. Please contact reception to make necessary arrangements.**

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Cambridge Lodge has a no refund policy on the prepaid security deposit or once the booking has been paid in full.
There are no refunds on a cancellation, no show or reduction in numbers.
Seasonal rules and payment restrictions will apply when booking in high seasons or for special events.
For full details plesae contact Cambridge Lodge directly.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Cambridge Lodge has the right to sleep your group in any configuration needed to fit you into the hostel with in reason.

A 50% deposit is required for group bookings. The remaining balance is due 7 days prior to arrival. No refunds for group bookings.

houseRules.notes:
Cambridge Lodge Budget Hostel Terms & Conditions:

- Cancellation policy: cancellations made up to 24 hours prior to arrival date will not incur a fee - after this time the first nights accommodation will be charged.
- Office Hours: Mon - Sun 9.30am - 6.30pm **If you are set to arrive after 6:30pm you must let us know so arrangements can be made for you. Late arrival bookings must be prepaid.**
- Reception on Merchant St
- Age Restriction for 6 bed dorm and 4 bed dorm rooms (18 -40 y.o.)
- During winter reception will be open from 8:30am - 6.30pm. **Please be aware of this when booking and advise if you are going to be checking in after 6:30pm. After hours check in is available by request only. Please contact reception to make necessary arrangements.**

24hr cancellation policy - after this time the first nights accommodation will be taken.
NOTE: 18 to 40 year old foreign travellers only so a valid passport is needed. (4 bed dorms or 6 bed dorms rooms)

CHRISTMAS/NEW YEAR SPECIAL POLICIES:
All bookings made over the CHRISTMAS/NYE PERIOD require FULL PAYMENT prior to arrival. Your listed credit card will be charged the full amount of your stay on December 1st

Christmas/New Years:. All bookings for the period 24/12/23 - 05/01/24 will be charged in full on 1st December 2023 . Declined payment may result in cancellation of the booking. Payments made for bookings during this period are non-refundable and non-transferable. A 2% card surcharge applies.
If your booking is made after December 1st, your card will be charged immediately.
